spike_trap.entry_text: Hahahaha! You fools, you have found my spike trap!
spike_trap.fail_text: You fools! You have failed! Suffer!

Healing_Room.entry_text: I shall take pity on you bumbling incompetents, be healed!
Healing_Room.fail_text: It is LITERALLY impossible to fail this!
Healing_Room.pass_text: Wail with gratitude at my generosity, wretches!

Weapon_Upgrade_Room.entry_text: Polish your armour, for you shall need it soon!
Weapon_Upgrade_Room.fail_text: It is LITERALLY impossible to fail this!
Weapon_Upgrade_Room.pass_text: Wail with gratitude at my generosity, wretches!
